replies.body:
{{champion:102}} Hey Jarvan can I talk to you for a second?

{{champion:59}} I'll be happy to. I got nothing to do until Blitzcrank comes with the data for the next date. 

{{champion:102}} Well that is what I want to talk about. I don't think you need to do these dates anymore. 

{{champion:59}} But why? You know that I need to find someone who will help me create the next generation. 

{{champion:102}} Well that also something I need to talk to you about. Remember that New Years party?

{{champion:59}} I thought we both agree to never talk about that.

{{champion:102}} We did but something happened that requires us to talk about it. 

{{champion:59}} Ok well what about that day do we need to talk about? 

{{champion:102}} Well..you see...you and I...umm...How can I say this?

{{champion:59}} This isn't like you Shyvana. Come on show me that strength and confidence I know. 

{{champion:102}} *Deep Breath*

*Door Open*

{{champion:53}}  **Hello Jarvan IV. I am here with the data from your test and it result for your next date.**

{{champion:102}} I'M PREGNANT AND YOU ARE THE FATHER JARVAN!!!!

{{champion:53}} **Analyzing audio sound. Computing...result found: I see you are busy so I will come back another day. **

*Closes door*

{{champion:53}} **......Activating Overdrive program ***Runs away*

{{champion:59}} .......

{{champion:102}} Well?

{{champion:59}} ........*faints*

{{champion:102}} Oh Hell no. You are not fainting on me!!! 

*slap*

{{champion:59}} Oww...You are right. I can't be a coward here, not now. 

{{champion:102}} So what are we going to do?

{{champion:59}} 1st) We need to tell my father. 2nd) we need to set up that land for you, and 3rd) we need to start planning the wedding. 

{{champion:102}} W-W-W-WEDDING!!!? *faints*


Next time: The Final Chapter.
Rito plis, Groom Jarvan IV and Bride Shivana skins please!
Queen Ashe and King Tryndamere have some competition

Wedding Dress {{champion:102}} would be sooo sweet
Hopefully they'll consider making one
I would insta-buy both of them. Also ROYAL DRAGON BABIES!! I want one!
I desperately want to know what wedding dragon form would look like.
http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m6/tcei/Horizons/wedding_dress.jpg

That would be amusing. 

*On Summoner's Rift* Shyvana ults in the middle of a teamfight. The enemy team pauses, "Is that a Dragon... in a wedding dress?" And then they are all nommed because Shyvana :3
You, sir lightdragoon88, are the freakin man! You are the reason I look at Riots sales pages, desperately hoping for the next story.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m40tduktSR1r7627ro1_500.gif
you have a tumblr?
No I do not.
AMEN! Logged in to upvote xD

In the alternate universe of Dota 2, Dragon Knight ponders the true nature of his birth...
{{champion:59}}  + {{champion:102}}  = <3
haha I can just imagine blitzcrank running away
https://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m7rbbeH89n1qk8bc7o1_r1_500.gif
Using his W most likely xD
Well his W is called "Overdrive"
Rito, make this man in charge of Champion lore and everything regarding Runeterra. He'll do a good job.

Nah I wouldn't do a good job. 


I would do a great job. :P

Now that we are so close to the end of this story I was wondering if you had anything planned for once this story ends. Also, how great would it be if Thursday's sale was {{champion:102}} , {{champion:59}} , and {{champion:53}}  just because of this story?  Great job with these stories and I hope you keep it up
I am going to take a week break to flesh out a few ideas I have before coming back with a new story.
YES!{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} Even the poros are jumping for joy!{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
YAY {{champion:102}} AND {{champion:59}} ARE GETTING MARRIED!!!

***Meanwhile...***

{{champion:84}} You know Doctor, maybe now Jarvan will be forced to see and finally appreciate what has been in front of him this entire time.
{{champion:85}} I think you give him too much credit. More likely than not we will be seeing him again in the very near future.
{{champion:84}} Of course we will, Shyvana will require pre-natal care and it is only fitting that the baby's father be present for at least some of the visits.
{{champion:85}} That's not what I meant.
{{champion:84}} I am aware.
{{champion:85}} ...
{{champion:84}} For once, I am going to give Jarvan the benefit of the doubt and assume he will not screw this up so hard that it lands him back here.
{{champion:85}} His track record doesn't support that assumption.
{{champion:84}} All things in balance, Doctor. That being said, I intend to continue to keep an eye on them... just in case.
{{champion:85}} That is probably a good idea.
{{champion:84}} *Vanishes.*
Yordles are the new Bartenders
what if they made a champ that was the offspring of them in honor of this story... riot here are some ideas for ya{{summoner:2}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:59}}

Kyaaaaa *-* I love your stories! I feel so stupid though D: I almost spent the whole last night waiting for this chapter because i was so excited to read the next one >.<! Until i realised it was later on today ........ 
 The intense waiting now continues D:

Btw im from oceania (Wa,Perth) so yeah .-. Flicking over to see the early news and these stories >.<

heck, i'm from Brunei and you don't even know where it is unless you google it lol

so it's like we're 10+++ hours ahead of you guys
Dear god....
RIP lightdragoon stories...they might not have been of highest quality, but they brought a smile to my face every week.  Now we just need J4 and Shyv to go from fanon to canon.  Rito pls

You have Thursday sale story to look forward to.

Awww man it's going to end already? I was hoping for something with {{champion:21}}  . I was wondering do you have plans for you next story? Maybe something with {{champion:131}} and {{champion:89}} ?
